description:
This course is for anyone who wants to earn money by creating animated promo or explainer videos. We will learn a web based animation software called PowToon. The tool requires no prior knowledge of animation. To learn the concepts I have broken the course into several units where we work on Writing Catchy Script, Objects, Transitions, Background Score and Recorded Sounds separately.

The best way to learn something is by doing and that's what we will do here. We will use all of the above concepts and will create a promo video. The making of promo video will cover all the basics and advanced topics of animation and will help you understand the full workflow of producing a stunning animated promo video.

You should take this course if you want to make extra money or save thousands of dollars by making videos for yourself. Many of my students are already earning thousands of dollars every month by taking my course.

Enroll Today and Start Earning More.
title: Promo Videos - Learn Powtoon To Make  Animated Intro Videos
